divs: Sighting Detailswhile working out side at the resort we work my co worked and i spotted a rounnd object flying slowl about maybe 100 feet above our resort. it was moving right along the shore line from north to south. we keep a cheap digtal camera in our office . i ran and could only get one shot of it before it picked up speed rapidly and disappeared. the picture isnt good quailty i am afraid but i was excited and the camera is a cheap one. but in the photo you can see my co worker looking up at it in the upper right hand corner
